text: vāṉaṅkaḷum pūmiyum (tattam ellaiyiliruntu) vilakiviṭātapaṭi taṭuttuk koṇṭiruppavaṉ niccayamāka allāhtāṉ. (Tam ellaiyil iruntu) avviraṇṭum cāya muṟpaṭṭapōtilum avai cāyātapaṭi taṭukkakkūṭiyavaṉ allāhvait tavira vēṟoruvaṉumillai. Niccayamāka avaṉ poṟumaiyuṭaiyavaṉāka, maṉṉippuṭaiyavaṉāka irukkiṟāṉ
